front.title: PT-TLS: A Posture Transport (PT) Protocol Compatible with TNC Using Transport Layer Security (TLS)

abstract.t: This document specifies PT-TLS, a Posture Transport (PT) protocolcompatible with the Trusted Computing Group's IF-T Binding to TLS 1.0protocol. The document then evaluates PT-TLS against therequirements defined in the NEA Overview and Requirements and PB-TNCspecifications.
